text: Blessed Beatrice of Nazareth was nun, mystic, philosopher, and prioress at Notre-Dame-de-Nazareth from Belgium. She was born into the family of Gertrudis and Bartholoméus de Vleeschouwer of Tirlemont.Beatrice of Nazareth (c. 1200–1268) == References == Category:1200 births Category:1268 deaths
title: Beatrice of Nazareth
